metadata.title: Win a GT350R from Allen Grant!

sections: Learn how to put this rare Mustang through the paces at the track by Allen Grant himself.

When Ford reintroduced the Shelby GT350 on the modern S550 platform, enthusiasts went wild over the balanced corner-carver. Not only did they revive the GT350 moniker, but they built an aggressive track-only GT350R Mustang. Here is the chance to take home one incredible Shelby GT350R, but this one is even more special because it is the
yellow car and was built for Shelby American World Championship driver Allen Grant. Not only will one lucky person take home this rare
, but they will also learn how to drive the high-performance Mustang during a track day with Allen Grant himself along with some rare original memorabilia. So, go ahead and

to enter through Palm Springs Cruisin' Association and make a donation to be entered. All proceeds benefit the Desert Cancer Foundation which helps the treatment of cancer patients who lack health insurance or have insufficient funds to pay for medical treatment.

Slathered in a stunningly brilliant Triple Yellow with a contrasting black-painted roof, this Shelby GT350R has been striped to match Grant’s championship Conventry Motors 1963 Cobra Roadster by George Lucas. In absolute pristine shape, this Shelby GT350R has only 11,000 miles on the clock. A set of 19-inch carbon fiber wheels are bolted on all four corners and come wrapped with Michelin Pilot Sport Cup 2 rubber. The car also comes with a Shelby full vehicle cover for protection against the elements, and/of dust inside the garage. Included in the prize package is an extra set of racing wheels.t has less than 11,000 miles on the odometer and has been striped to match Grant’s championship Conventry Motors '63 Cobra Roadster by George Lucas.

Loaded with performance features, the GT350R is powered by a 5.2-liter Ti-VCT Flat Plane Crank V8 engine that generates a healthy 526-horsepower and 429 lb/ft of torque. Stopping all that power is as necessary as launching so big Brembo brakes were installed which are the most powerful brakes in a production Mustang. Drivability and handling stay in check thanks to an advanced suspension that includes the MagneRide damping system.
The inside of Allen's GT350R features Recaro Cloth/Miko suede manual sport seats. Also, the car is equipped with R-Electronics package and has a voice-activated touchscreen navigation system.
would make your life complete with plenty of track days ahead, go ahead and

to enter through Palm Springs Cruisin' Association. A simple donation to be entered in to win the prize of a lifetime. All proceeds benefit Desert Cancer Foundation to help the treatment of cancer patients who lack health insurance or have insufficient funds to pay for medical treatment.
